description: Enlargement of an existing outbuilding to create a combined gym, shed and boiler room that would be ancillary to the use of the main building as residential dwellings (Use Class C3)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall commence before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (As Amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings numbered/titled: Block Plan; Location Plan; and KL/1058-1.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | The development permitted shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential use or for any industrial, commercial or business use.
REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2016).
